林志玲台南辦婚宴　言承旭7次狂親小20歲少女
07 Nov 2019, 04:57 by 娛樂組
在前女友林志玲嫁給日星Akira之後，言承旭的感情狀態總令人好奇，不過他似乎全心投入工作，近來拍攝中國大陸偶像劇《交換吧愛情》，和飾演陸版《流星花園》的「杉菜」沈月大談相差20歲的老少戀。
言承旭在劇中飾演霸道總裁，他和沈月都曾演出過《流星花園》，但兩人實際年齡相差20歲，格外引起關注，有些本來有點疑慮的網友，看了預告之後發現，除了年齡差不違和之外，竟還有點甜。


言承旭在短短2分半的預告中，就和沈月有7次吻戲。（翻攝自交換吧運氣微博）

言承旭還在劇中重現《流星花園》經典台詞「如果道歉有用，要警察幹嘛！」勾起不少人的回憶。此外他和沈月在曝光的2分半預告中，光是吻戲就多達7次，讓網友稱讚，「這次真的可以」「言承旭更配少女」。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 04:55

Lin Zhiling Tainan Office Wedding Banquet Xu Chengxu 7 times mad kiss small 20-year-old girl
07 Nov 2019, 04:57 by Entertainment Group
After the ex-girlfriend Lin Zhiling married the Japanese star Akira, Yan Chengxu’s emotional state is always curious, but he seems to be fully engaged in his work, recently filming the Chinese idol drama “Exchange Love” and playing the land version of Meteor Garden. The "Shanshan" Shenyue talks about the 20-year-old love between the young and the old.
Yan Chengxu played the overbearing president in the play. He and Shen Yue both performed "Meteor Garden", but the actual age difference between the two was 20 years old, which attracted special attention. Some netizens who had a bit of doubts, after reading the notice, found that except In addition to the age difference, there is still some sweetness.


In the short notice of 2 and a half minutes, Yan Chengxu had seven kisses with Shen Yue. (Reflection from the exchange bar luck microblogging)

Jerry Yan still recreates the classic line of "Meteor Garden" in the play. "If you apologize, what do you want the police to do!" recalls many people's memories. In addition, he and Shen Yue in the two-and-a-half-minute notice of the exposure, as long as the kiss is as many as seven times, let netizens praise, "This time really can" "Jian Chengxu is more suitable for girls."
